    com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.Spen.initialize(Context, int, int, boolean)
    This API is deprecated. All input parameters (except context and maxCacheSize are set by default values).
    createMode is set default by SPEN_STATIC_LIB_MODE.
    isForce32BitMode is set default by true.
